EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Big Data Suite_Q214.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow: Pivotal Big Data Suite Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We're sending you a friendly reminder of your registration for our upcoming webinar "Changing the Economics of Big Data. Forever" tomorrow, April 23, 2014 at 9:00 AM PDT/5:00PM GMT+1. We look forward to you joining us. Please see the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, April 23, 2014 Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco)/5:00PM GMT+1 (London) Event Number: 669 375 902 Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=669375902> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=112132122&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 669 375 902
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
